dct_title_s: Hudson River: New York to Haverstraw I
dct_description_sm: Hudson River at the New York-New Jersey Boundary Line. North along Hudson River to Haverstraw, NY & Ossining, NY & south along Hudson River to Fort Lee, NJ & New York City, NY.

Map shows river depths and tidal flows at various locations along the Hudson River. Map includes topography of Linwood, NJ, Englewood, NJ, Piermont, NY, Nyack, NY, Tarrytown, NY, Dobbs Ferry, NY, Yonkers, NY, and Mt.Vernon, NY.
dcat_keyword_sm: Hudson River--Englewood Township--Bergen County--Tenafly--Bergen County--Cresskill--Bergen County--Closter
